turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zor matematik problemini düşünmüşsem, çözümü bulabilirdim.
english_example_sentence: If I had thought about this difficult math problem, I could have found the solution.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я подумал об этой сложной математической задаче, я мог бы найти решение.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu zor matematik problemini ______, çözümü bulabilirdim.
